availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Leonard O. Murray (Bracken County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Matilda M. Falkner Murray in Grant County on August 17, 1848. Father of William H. Murray, Mary J. Murray, Nicholas Murray, James B. Murray, Polly A. Murray. Resident of Kenton County in 1850. Farmer in Bracken County in 1860. Employed America Falkner as a domestic worker in Bracken County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 3, p. 248B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, District 1, p. 159.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Grant County Marriages, Film #001490815, p. 501 of 742 on microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
